an9.15:4.2: Tassassu gaṇḍassa nava vaṇamukhāni nava abhedanamukhāni.
an9.15:4.4: asuciyeva pagghareyya, duggandhaṃyeva pagghareyya, jegucchiyaṃyeva pagghareyya;
an9.15:4.6: asuciyeva pasaveyya, duggandhaṃyeva pasaveyya, jegucchiyaṃyeva pasaveyya.
an9.15:5.1: Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṃ mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassa.
an9.15:5.2: Tassassu gaṇḍassa nava vaṇamukhāni nava abhedanamukhāni.
an9.15:5.4: asuciyeva paggharati, duggandhaṃyeva paggharati, jegucchiyaṃyeva paggharati;
an9.15:5.6: asuciyeva pasavati, duggandhaṃyeva pasavati, jegucchiyaṃyeva pasavati.
